name: Mostly Accurate Flight Simulator
description:
I got suggested to make a Flight Simulator, and I did because I am passionate about flight (planes are super cool). Mostly made over the weekend, I made most of the stuff but I have to credit a few things so those are at the bottom.

In Mostly Accurate Flight Simulator (MAFS) you can fly a plane through a cool environment and crash, enjoying realistic physics-based crash disintegration and stuff. Flight is mostly realistic of course, don't mind a few things. Things like missions, scenarios, and more stuff in the map is coming soon so stay tuned. Have fun!

Credits:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/low-poly-road-pac...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-mini-village-free...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/cartoon-low-poly-cit...

https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/exterior/cityscape/nuclear-power-plant-4...

and https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49716989/unity-aircraft-physics for the answer to my broken plane physics formula
